title: Is The Patriots Defense The Worst In The NFL, Bad Beats, Tom Petty's Super Bowl XLII Performance (Football 10/04)
description:
Nick Kostos and Will Brinson start by discussing video game football. Find out which host dominated the other in Madden (3:00). Next, the guys discuss a wild finish and bad beat on Monday Night Football (4:45), if the Redskins can contend for the playoffs (11:43), and conclude their conversation, by reflecting on the life and career of Tom Petty, specifically his halftime performance at Super Bowl XLII (17:52). Then, Nick and Will are joined by Jason La Canfora and Pete Prisco for this week's latest edition of 'Hot Take or Just Right' (26:37).
 
To learn more about listener data and our privacy practices visit: https://www.audacyinc.com/privacy-policy

itunes:author: CBS Sports, Football, NFL, NFL Picks, NFL Betting, 2022 NFL, NFL Predictions, NFL Recap
itunes:subtitle: Nick Kostos, Will Brinson, Pete Prisco and Jason La Canfora discuss the Patriots, bad gambling beats, Madden, Tom Petty at the Super Bowl and much more!
